pullRequest.title: [1.16.x] bugfix: ItemStack#isDamageable is not calling Item#isDamagable
pullRequest.bodyText:
Backstory: I made an Item getting more Durability with an Enchantment, so from getMaxDurability -> get enchanemtnent list -> other mods added dynamic enchanments -> they checked if the item was damage able -> itemStack#isDamagebale calls Item#getMaxDamage -> stackoverflow.
I talked with diesieben07 with this and this is the solution we came up with.

commit.message: bugfix: ItemStack#isDamageable did not call Item#isDamagable
pathed Item#isDamageable to accept a stack when its possible

nodes.bodyText: We typically use the ItemStack bouncer, as it makes cleaner code and prevents any potential issues of the argument being wrong, but this is fine for now.
